events.message: The policyholder reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th. They filed the claim for damages sustained to their car.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords like vehicle collision and damage to car.
An insurance agent was promptly assigned to handle the case and reach out to the claimant for initial details.
The claimant was formally acknowledged with confirmation of receipt and steps moving forward explained clearly.
Requested the claimant to submit photos of vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates for processing.
Claimant has submitted all requested documentation including detailed photos of the accident impact and official police report.
An internal investigation commenced to verify the circumstances surrounding the vehicle accident and damages claimed.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of the claim validity, and no signs of fraudulent activity have been found.
A settlement offer was prepared based on assessed damages and policy coverage limits, communicated clearly to claimant.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling process.
The claim was formally approved following acceptance of the settlement offer without any disputes or delays.
Payment for the approved claim settlement was successfully processed and disbursed to the claimantâ€™s bank account.
The claim case was officially closed after successful payment and positive feedback from the claimant was recorded.
